jsonBody.data: {"inf":"POL01","c_id":475113,"cseq":5,"h_id":3686856,"type":"C","valid":"Y","caseno":6627839278,"listno":"2nd","def_age":62,"def_dob":"13-10-1958","def_sex":"M","def_addr":{"line1":49,"line2":"Rochester Avenue","pcode":"ad21 5dr","line3":"Bangor"},"def_name":"Webb Mitchell","def_type":"P","nationality_1":"Polish","offences":{"offence":[{"as":"Contrary to section 1(1) and 7 of the Theft Act 1968.","sum":"On 24/03/2016 at Edinburgh stole PLAYSTATION 4 to the value of 300.00, belonging to Dillard Everett.","code":"TH68010","oseq":1,"co_id":1142407,"title":"Theft from the person of another","maxpen":"EW: 6M &/or Ultd Fine"},{"as":"Contrary to section 39 of the Criminal Justice Act 1988.","sum":"On 01/01/2016 at Aberdeen assaulted Doyle Kaufman by beating him.","code":"TH68010","oseq":1,"co_id":1142407,"title":"Assault by beating","maxpen":"EW: 6M &/or Ultd Fine"},{"as":"Contrary to section 39 of the Criminal Justice Act 1988.","sum":"On 01/01/2016 at Leeds assaulted Hopper Munoz by beating him.","code":"TH68010","oseq":1,"co_id":1142407,"title":"Assault by beating","maxpen":"EW: 6M &/or Ultd Fine"},{"as":"Contrary to section 39 of the Criminal Justice Act 1988.","sum":"On 01/01/2016 at Birmingham assaulted Whitehead Dickerson by beating him.","code":"TH68010","oseq":1,"co_id":1142407,"title":"Assault by beating","maxpen":"EW: 6M &/or Ultd Fine"},{"as":"Contrary to section 1(1) and 7 of the Theft Act 1968.","sum":"On 01/01/2015 at Waretel, Preston, stole ROBOTS to the value of Â£987.00, belonging to Harrison Mason.","code":"TH68010","oseq":1,"co_id":1142407,"title":"Theft from a shop","maxpen":"EW: 6M &/or Ultd Fine"}]}}
